Actions.Name: Beetle Horn
Effects: Foe most save or become winded.
Deals bonus damage against foes at range 2.

Actions.Name: Side Harpoons
Actions.Description: The Beetle deals 2 damage to a foe in range 4 once for each mounted ally. Each foe must be hit at least once before it can be targeted again.

Actions.Name: Rampage
Actions.Description: The beetle dashes up to 2 spaces. When it passes by a foe or ends this movement, that foe takes [fray] damage and is shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Main Harpoon
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 must save or take 2[D]+[fray], become dazed, and be shoved until adjacent to the beetle. On a success, the foe takes [D]+[fray] and is shoved 2 towards the beetle instead.
